title: Specialist II, Marketing - Sports Equipment
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Specialist II, Marketing Posted/Updated: 10-21-2015 Brief Job Description: Participates as a specialized knowledge resource in established processes. Suggests improvements to business processes and independently completes small sub-projects within a defined course of action.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
